ragnar 0.1.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ragnar (development version)

  • New function embed_google_vertex() (@dfalbel, #49)

  • New function embed_databricks() (@atheriel, #45)

  • New function ragnar_chunks_view() for quickly previewing chunks (#42)

  • ragnar_register_tool_retrieve() gains optional name and title arguments to allow for more descriptive tool registration. These values can also be set in ragnar_store_create() (#43).

  • ragnar_read() and read_as_markdown() now accept paths that begin with ~ (@topepo, #46, #48).

  • Changes to read_as_markdown() HTML conversion (#40):

    • If a ‘main’ tag is present, content outside the ‘main’ tag is now excluded by default. To restore the previous behavior and include the sidebar, header, footer, and other navigational elements in the converted markdown, use read_as_markdown(x, main_only=FALSE).

    • Fixed handling of nested code fences in markdown output.

ragnar 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2025-05-30

  • Initial CRAN submission.
